external_references.description: Unit 42. (2017, December 15). Unit 42 Playbook Viewer. Retrieved December 20, 2017.

objects.description: [OilRig](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0049) has used [RGDoor](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0258) via Web shell to establish redundant access. The group has also used harvested credentials to gain access to Internet-accessible resources such as Outlook Web Access, which could be used for redundant access.
